description: Edgar facts will teach you about Edgar the dog, even if you can't interact with him physically. This skill will teach you everything there is to know about Edgar with more facts added as they are discovered. To get started, just say "Alexa, tell me an Edgar fact".
exampleInteractions: Alexa, tell me an Edgar fact.
Alexa, tell me an Edgar fact about what I can say.
Alexa, tell me an Edgar fact about licensing.
name: Edgar Facts
shortDescription: Edgar Facts is for anyone who loves Edgar the dog and can't get enough of that adorable bugg. Brighten your day with fun facts about Edgar!
